website_summaries.verdict: The Galaxy Tab S 10.5 is the best Android-powered media tablet available, but its competition is stiff.
cons: Wi-Fi and GPU performance not quite up to the competition

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet, top of the Android tree...
customer_reviews.text: Great Tablet, way nicer than the iPad, and before you say anything, I have an iPad too! Very fast, Colours are great, Black is Black when watching in a darkened room the black is not a grey at all... Took a while to get used to Samsung flavour of Android, I am used to a purer version on other devices, but over all a great product.
customer_reviews.author: N. Rowbottom

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tablet - I bought a reconditioned one and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tablet - I bought a reconditioned one and it has become my trusty friend, I use it for phone calls, texting, messenger, video calls, work, filming work clips, everything on the move. Only one thing, some apps drain the battery quite fast - Facebook being the worst one. And you have to be careful not to have too many apps as these eat up the 16 GB memory but it is happy with a 64 GB memory card. I am so pleased with this. I was so happy with this tablet I bought a cheaper non-sim one for a relative as a present and she was sooooo happy too!
customer_reviews.author: Sister Marika Rebicsek

customer_reviews.title: A nice piece of tech
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing piece of kit. The colours and quality of the demo video are fantastic, almost 3D, and give good idea of screen resolution. It does have a 3/4G Micro Sim Card slot, which is useful. Works beautifully and very smoothly. A micro SD card is on order, for photo and music storage. I have used a Kindle HD Fire up until now, and the Samsung is far more capable, with access to Google Play, which is the Kindles major annoyance. Looked at IPads, a lot of money, but are they better?
customer_reviews.author: Rolfester

customer_reviews.title: This is an absolutely beautiful tablet. I bought one for my other half ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely beautiful tablet. I bought one for my other half for Xmas and lasted until March before jealousy took over and I got one of my own. It's incredibly thin and light, and robust enough to have survived 4 months of said other half dropping it on the floor twice a week.The display is the sharpest I've ever seen and the tablet is very responsive. As a caution, please check seller feedback before you purchase. Amazon don't seem to be selling these directly any more and the second unit I bought turned out to be an import that didn't speak English without a great deal of persuasion. Some functions do not work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Dunlop

customer_reviews.title: Great productivity tool and great for video and photos
customer_reviews.text: Great productivity tool and great for video and photos. Looks great, works perfectly and allows me to work anywhere. A breeze to work on the train or a corner somewhere while on the move. For a lifestyle business this is the perfect "on the go" tool. The screen is amazing for video and photos too (cant work all the time). Organising and viewing photos has become so easy I actually enjoy it for the first time ever! Probably the best thing about this as I can now easily see all my thousands of pics with a swipe - so much nicer than on the laptop. Love this Tab.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: I decided to go for the tab S rather than an ipad because I believe there are other good brands out there than apple brands
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ever tablet and I chose carefully. I decided to go for the tab S rather than an ipad because I believe there are other good brands out there than apple brands. I am sure the Ipad is great, but not for me. The tab S is everything I expect in a tablet, very stylish and fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: F K.

customer_reviews.title: My first tablet and I love it. Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: My first tablet and I love it. Works as expected. The only downside is that the battery drains far more quickly than I thought it would. I am frequently dependant on my Anker portable charger. Also, if only if this were Windows...
customer_reviews.author: Priya

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade from Tab 2 to this.....
customer_reviews.text: The upgrade from a tab 2 had to happen, and this was my choice. Love Samsung tablets and this one is no exception, can't say much more than that. The only things I don't like is the physical home key as I tend to use my tablets in portrait mode and I am sure the next reiteration will remove it. Also, touchwiz, replaced it with Nova.
customer_reviews.author: Chunky1234

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely delighted! Received the next day and well packed
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely delighted! Received the next day and well packed. Vast improvement on my old Tab 2 10.1 which was very slow in comparison. I like the multi-screen feature, especially when I am sitting there reading my Kindle App and my husband asks me to look something up on the internet which I can do now without coming out of the app. Same size overall as my old 10.1 but much lighter. The screen clarity is excellent and the camera takes clear crisp images.
customer_reviews.author: V. Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S 10.5 inch tablet (Bronze)
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Ultimate Phoneshop for my order which came on time as requested. The item a Samsung Galaxy Tab S 10.5 inch (Bronze) tablet is a fantastic piece of heardware very and useful tablet all round. Will buy the next model version whenever it becomes available.
customer_reviews.author: Magical Dave

customer_reviews.title: Im on the fence both companies make great tablets but I like the ability to customise my ...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my iPad. Im on the fence both companies make great tablets but I like the ability to customise my interface and Use 3rd party apps which I guess is the common answer to why android. Its fast and I works overtime. No problems so far
customer_reviews.author: Ben Perry

customer_reviews.title: easy set up
customer_reviews.text: arrived early...... easy to set up ....great product so far.......fantastic screen colours...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very quick delivery and one very happy customer, I would recommend this tablet all day ...
customer_reviews.text: very quick delivery and one very happy customer, I would recommend this tablet all day long very good value for your money
customer_reviews.author: Alex Clancy

customer_reviews.title: Had various faults. Got a refund and bought from another supplier. Losing faith in Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Camera would not focus. Mobile Data would not connect. Micro SD card would not format. I got a full refund and bought from the Car Phone Warehouse which was more expensive but it all worked! Beware of goods not sourced in the UK.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, fast
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, fast, great screen.....can't fault this tablet. It does everything I need it to. I've done the iPad thing, but just prefer the Samsung / Android tablets.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: She's not disappointed with it
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this present. She's not disappointed with it: I'm not disappointed with her response!
customer_reviews.author: MikeA

customer_reviews.title: so loved it bought another
customer_reviews.text: Replacement, so loved it bought another! (Dropped and broke the original).
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: This tablet is so beautiful to see and to use
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for, so rare i.e. UK and still android Kitkat. This tablet is so beautiful to see and to use.
customer_reviews.author: green

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from Tab 3 transition was faultless with everything as expected, extra features make this one truly outstanding tablet
customer_reviews.author: james alan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TABLET
customer_reviews.text: An awesome bit of kit - fantastic screen. I hardly use my laptop now.
customer_reviews.author: family

customer_reviews.title: Lovely new toy
customer_reviews.text: Still getting to know new tablet but so far am delighted with it and the larger size makes it so much easier to read and write e-mails.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: a great tablet.
customer_reviews.text: a really nice bit of gear very quick and beautiful colour,i'mstill figuring all the things i can use this for.
customer_reviews.author: R. Christian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cannot imagine life without it. Super-duper product. User friendly and everything works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Marlien

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a good price, quickly delivered. Excellent service.
customer_reviews.author: P. Bray

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful bit of kit, but be aware, the one I ordered came from Hong Kong, and would not read UK sim cards, so unfortunately had to return. Ordered another from Samsung UK, works perfectly with UK sims. Fantastic tablet, well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Smooth

customer_reviews.title: First tablet and we were not disappointed. It's lightweight
customer_reviews.text: First tablet and we were not disappointed. It's lightweight, fast, responsive, has an excellent screen and works with the minimum of fuss under Android KitKat. Combined with a Samsung Memory 64GB Evo MicroSDXC, it has more than enough storage. Worth paying the extra for the 4G version and we also managed to get a 600GB sim only deal for £5 per month so when we're off WiFi, that will kick in. Of course it might not have the snob value of an i-Pad but you're not locked in to Apple products and I can't believe that's any better.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Avoid technical in depth technical stuff. This tablet seems technical be amazing and does everthing amazingly. The display, in particular, is stunning. It also appears to be very quick and responsive.
customer_reviews.author: HAMBONE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Such a good tablet, works so well, amazing clarity, very fast, a pleasure to use!
customer_reviews.author: my Amazing Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this Tablet. would recommend it. The only thing it takes long to recharge - overnight but holds charge
customer_reviews.author: Geralda Mathurin

customer_reviews.title: Always read the label.
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet but does tend to get stuck in throat.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Useless after 18 months!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Copied this from another review but i could not have said it better!!! Do not buy this tablet as Samsung is no longer a dependable company. My tab S, after 18 months of light normal use, started freezing and crashing. Tech support is non existent from Samsung. Even after a factory reset which should not have been necessary, it is still a useless brick which can no longer be used for anything. Be warned!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rafiu40

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: It works very well, and the screen is amazing, it exceeded my expectations in every attribute of performance. It is very thin, and it also looks very good. However, sometimes being to thinner it is not so good at all, because inserting the simcard and the sdcard could be a little difficult. You probably will have to use a pen cap as I did. P.S.: It came with many similar applications from Samsung and Google. REALLY BAD POINT because you could have more memory available.
customer_reviews.author: Guilherme Rodrigues

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S 10.5-inch Tablet (Bronze) - (ARM Exynos 5 Octa-Core 1.9GHz, 3GB RAM, 16GB Storage, Wi-Fi, 3G, 4G LTE, Android 4.4)
product_meta.description:
The Galaxy Tab S embodies the next evolution in mobile display technology, delivering a wider range of rich and crisp colours. Its industry-leading WQXGA (2560 x 1600, 16:10) Super AMOLED display delivers more than 90% of Adobe RGB colour coverage - expressing more colours than ever before - and has a remarkable 100000:1 contrast ratio which provides deeper and more realistic images by making blacks darker and whites brighter.

The Galaxy Tab S also features additional Samsung screen technologies that go beyond the hardware specifications. The tablet's Adaptive Display ensures the best visual experience anywhere, anytime by intelligently adjusting gamma, saturation, and sharpness based on the application being viewed, the colour temperature of the viewing environment and ambient lighting. Pre-set professional modes (AMOLED Cinema and AMOLED Photo) also lets users manually adjust the display settings for bright, dynamic results for both video and photo content.

In addition, Galaxy Tab S users can fully enjoy content clearly and easily outdoors, even in bright sunlight. The tablet's advanced outdoor visibility technology makes on-screen content look bright, natural, and easy to view.

The Galaxy Tab S is made for entertainment and comes packed with a variety of content including the debut of the Samsung magazine service, "Papergarden". An optimised viewing environment for digital interactive magazines, Papergarden users will be able to view a wide range of popular magazines with vivid and true-to-life colours.

Through 'Galaxy Gifts', Samsung has teamed up with more than 30 of the world's leading mobile content and service providers to offer Galaxy Tab S users the ultimate home, work, and play entertainment experience through premium content and services across a wide range of industries.

Beautifully crafted and designed with architectural aesthetics, the Galaxy Tab S is modern and sleek. Extending this design identity, the Galaxy Tab S offers a choice of several fashionable and practically designed custom accessories (available separately).

BOX CONTAINS
Samsung Galaxy Tablet
AC Adapter
Data Cable
User Documentation
feature_bullets: Experience stunningly vivid and true-to-life Super AMOLED picture quality
See more and do more with a range of advanced multitasking features
Enjoy slim, light and energy-efficient design with a fingerprint scanner
